results.title: Just
results.brief_description: In a room above a street, Radiohead play their song, ‘Just’. In the street below, a man lies on the ground, attracting a number of concerned, irritated and worried passers-by. But his condition may be contagious…..

results.title: My crazy life = Mi vida loca
results.creator_credit: Allison Anders, Carl-Jan Colpaert, Daniel Hassid and Cineville
results.brief_description: Echo Park is a tough inner city neighbourhood, made up of mainly Hispanic-Americans. Violence, drugs and gangs are part of life here but instead of focusing on the male violence, Allison Anders has centred the narrative around the phenomenon of girl gangs, love and hate, friendship and rivalry as they struggle to fight for their own identity within the gang regime. Sad Girl (Angel Aviles), Mousie (Seidy Lopez) and Ernesto (Jacob Vargas) are the central characters which the film revolves around and the romantic entanglements between Ernesto and Sad Girl and Ernesto and Mousie - whilst initially causing havoc and betrayal - finally unites the three together. There is an underlying feminist feel to this film which includes several other female characters providing narration, depth and a richness to the central theme. Actual gang members were used along with several cameo roles by film directors, musicians and the members of Los Lobos. Cast also includes Panchito Gomez, Julian Reyes, Marlo Marron, Bertila Damas, Ric Salinas, Salma Hayek, Christina Solis, Gabriel Gonzales, Arthur Esquer, Nelida Lopez and Jesse Borrego.

results.title: Jurassic Park [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Steven Spielberg, Gerald Molen, Kathleen Kennedy, Amblin Entertainment and Universal Pictures
results.brief_description: Based on Michael Crichton’s best-selling novel of the same name, this is a Spielberg masterpiece of imagination, suspense, science and cinematic magic. On a remote island, a wealthy entrepreneur (Richard Attenborough) secretly creates a theme park featuring living dinosaurs ressurected from extinction through the use of fossilised DNA. Before opening it to the public he invites renowned paleontologist (Sam Neill), paleobotanist (Bruce Dern) and mathematician (Jeff Goldblum) with his two grandchildren, to experience the park - with fatal results. This entertaining film carries a strong message regarding the use of science for material gain and to manipulate life.

results.title: My cousin Vinny
results.creator_credit: Jonathan Lynn, Paul Schiff, Dale Launer, Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation and Peter V Miller Investment Corporation
results.brief_description: Two naive college boys, Billy and Stan, are on a summer holiday driving across Alabama, deep in the American south, when they unexpectedly find themselves accused of murder. Fearing the death sentence Billy calls his cousin Vincent La Guardia Gambini (Joe Pesci), a brassy and inexperienced New York lawyer, to defend him. Continuously charged with contempt of court by Judge Haller (Fred Gwynne in his final film role), Vincent has the odds stacked against his client, and has to learn the manner and quirks of the law in order to win the case. Marisa Tomei plays Vinny’s fast-talking fiancee (clad in a series of garish outfits) whose automobile expertise may be the key to proving Billy and Stan’s innocence. “My cousin Vinny” is a courtroom comedy that pitches abrasive New Yorkers against redneck Southerners, with all the cultural cliches of both sets of Americans broadly drawn on. Directed by Jonathan Lynn (The Whole nine yards, Sgt. Bilko), “My cousin Vinny” is probably best remembered as the film that won Marisa Tomei an Oscar for best supporting actress.

results.title: Jupiter odyssey
results.creator_credit: Peter Waller, George Van Valkenburg and United States. National Aeronautics Space Administration
results.brief_description: The story of the 620 million mile journey of Pioneer 10 from Earth to Jupiter. Pioneer 10, launched in 1972, arrived at Jupiter in December 1973. Presents information received from the Pioneer 10 mission, and describes how the information has been used to reprogram Pioneer 11 and redirect it in December 1974 toward a 1979 rendezvous with Saturn. Additionally, a proposal is discussed for another mission, decades in the future, that will land on the satellite to study a solar eclipse of Jupiter.

results.title: Juno and the paycock
results.creator_credit: Alfred Hitchcock and British International Pictures
results.brief_description: This adaptation of Sean O’Casey’s play by director Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville was lauded by the critics but Hitchcock was dissatisfied with the finished film. During the Dublin uprising, an impoverished family stand to receive an inheritance but things do not go as planned and the money does not come through. Their daughter is soon to give birth to an illegitmate child and their son is accused of being an informer.
